verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> saying to <S%H559>them,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063><s%> 'These are the living <S%H2416>things<s%> which you may <S%H398>eat<s%> among all the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Whatever <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is <S%H8156>cloven-footed,<s%> and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> among the <S%H929>animals,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

<S%H389><s%>"'Nevertheless these you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of those that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of those who <S%H6536>part<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof:<s%> the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> because he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>doesn't<s%> have a parted <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> he is unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
The <S%H8227>coney,<s%> because he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>doesn't<s%> have a parted <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> he is unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
The <S%H768>hare,<s%> because she <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>doesn't<s%> part the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> she is unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
The <S%H2386>pig,<s%> because he has a <S%H6536>split<s%> <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is <S%H8156>cloven-footed,<s%> but <S%H1641>doesn't<s%> chew the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> he is unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
Of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> you shall not <S%H5060>touch;<s%> they are unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>

<S%H398><s%>"'These you may eat of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> whatever has <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

All that <S%H5579>don't<s%> have fins and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> of all that <S%H8318>move<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of all the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creatures<s%> that are in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> they are an abomination to <S%H8263>you,<s%>
and you detest <S%H398>them.<s%> You shall not eat of their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and you shall detest their <S%H5038>carcasses.<s%>
Whatever has no <S%H5579>fins<s%> nor <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that is an abomination to <S%H8263>you.<s%>

<S%H8262><s%>"'These you shall detest <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>birds;<s%> they shall not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they are an <S%H8262>abomination:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>vulture,<s%> and the black <S%H6538>vulture,<s%>
and the red <S%H344>kite,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of black <S%H344>kite,<s%>
any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H6158>raven,<s%>
the horned <S%H1323>owl,<s%> the screech <S%H8464>owl,<s%> and the <S%H7828>gull,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H5322>hawk,<s%>
the little <S%H3563>owl,<s%> the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%> the great <S%H3563>owl,<s%>
the white <S%H8580>owl,<s%> the desert <S%H6893>owl,<s%> the <S%H7360>osprey,<s%>
the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H601>heron,<s%> the <S%H1744>hoopoe,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
<S%H5775><s%>"'All flying <S%H8318>insects<s%> that <S%H8318>walk<s%> on all <S%H702>fours<s%> are an abomination to <S%H8263>you.<s%>

Yet you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5775>these:<s%> of all winged <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things that <S%H1980>go<s%> on all <S%H702>fours,<s%> which have <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H2004>with<s%> which to <S%H5425>hop<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Even of these you may <S%H398>eat:<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H697>locust,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H5556>katydid,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H2728>cricket,<s%> and any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of <S%H2284>grasshopper.<s%>
But all <S%H5775>winged<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> which have <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> are an abomination to <S%H8263>you.<s%>
<S%H2930><s%>"'By these you will become unclean: whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
Whoever <S%H5375>carries<s%> any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H929><s%>"'Every animal which <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is not <S%H8157>cloven-footed,<s%> nor <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to <S%H5060>you.<s%> Everyone who touches them shall be <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> on its <S%H3709>paws,<s%> among all <S%H2416>animals<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> on all <S%H702>fours,<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to <S%H5060>you.<s%> Whoever touches their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

He who <S%H5375>carries<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%> They are unclean to <S%H2930>you.<s%>

<S%H2931><s%>"'These are they which are unclean to you among the creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> on the <S%H776>earth:<s%> the <S%H2467>weasel,<s%> the <S%H5909>rat,<s%> any <S%H4327>kind<s%> of great <S%H6632>lizard,<s%>
the <S%H604>gecko,<s%> and the monitor <S%H3581>lizard,<s%> the wall <S%H3911>lizard,<s%> the <S%H2546>skink,<s%> and the <S%H8580>chameleon.<s%>

These are they which are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among all that <S%H8318>creep.<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> them when they are <S%H4194>dead,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

On whatever any of them <S%H5307>falls<s%> when they are <S%H4194>dead,<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether it is any <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> or <S%H899>clothing,<s%> or <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or <S%H8242>sack,<s%> whatever <S%H3627>vessel<s%> it <S%H4399>is,<s%> with which any work is <S%H6213>done,<s%> it must be <S%H935>put<s%> into <S%H4325>water,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> then it will be clean.
Every <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> into which any of them <S%H5307>falls,<s%> all that is in it shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and you shall break <S%H7665>it.<s%>

All <S%H400>food<s%> which may be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> that on which <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and all <S%H4945>drink<s%> that may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in every such <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

Everything whereupon part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether <S%H8574>oven,<s%> or range for <S%H2931>pots,<s%> it shall be broken in pieces: they are unclean, and shall be unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
Nevertheless a spring or a cistern in which <S%H4325>water<s%> is a gathered shall be <S%H2889>clean:<s%> but that which <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
If part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on any <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> which is to be <S%H2232>sown,<s%> it is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
But if <S%H4325>water<s%> is <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H2931>it,<s%> it is unclean to you.
<S%H929><s%>"'If any animal, of which you may <S%H402>eat,<s%> <S%H4191>dies;<s%> he who <S%H5060>touches<s%> its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

He who <S%H398>eats<s%> of its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%> He also who <S%H5375>carries<s%> its <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>
<S%H8318><s%>"'Every creeping thing that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> is an <S%H8263>abomination.<s%> It shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

Whatever <S%H1980>goes<s%> on its <S%H1512>belly,<s%> and whatever <S%H1980>goes<s%> on all <S%H702>fours,<s%> or whatever has many <S%H7272>feet,<s%> even all creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> them you shall not <S%H398>eat;<s%> for they are an <S%H8263>abomination.<s%>

You shall not <S%H8262>make<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> with any creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps,<s%> neither shall you make yourselves <S%H2933>unclean<s%> with <S%H2930>them,<s%> that you should be defiled thereby.

For I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> Sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves<s%> <S%H6918>therefore,<s%> and be holy; for I am <S%H6918>holy:<s%> neither shall you <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> with any kind of creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that moves on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall therefore be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> for I am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the <S%H929>animal,<s%> and of the <S%H5775>bird,<s%> and of every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of every <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

to make a <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and between the living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%> and the living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that may not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>'"
